evals.prompt: Create a project rule for our TypeScript React project that enforces PascalCase for components and camelCase for functions
evals.expected_output: Creates .trae/rules/code-style.md with alwaysApply: true and proper naming conventions

evals.prompt: Set up security rules for our project - never log passwords, always validate input at entry points
evals.expected_output: Creates .trae/rules/security.md with alwaysApply: true and security guidelines from official docs

evals.prompt: Make AI always use TypeScript interfaces instead of types for object definitions
evals.expected_output: Creates a rule with globs: *.ts,*.tsx enforcing interface usage for objects

evals.prompt: 创建一个规则，让AI在写测试时必须遵循AAA模式
evals.expected_output: Creates .trae/rules/testing.md with globs for test files and AAA pattern guidelines

evals.prompt: I need a rule that only applies to Python files enforcing snake_case for variables
evals.expected_output: Creates .trae/rules/python-style.md with globs: *.py and snake_case conventions
